features: Gore infinium outer with taped key seams for added weather protection
ski helmet compatible hood with wired peak
Double ended full length front YKK Aquaguard Vislon zip
Extra large internal stash pockets plus inner zipped pocket
Fully adjustable hem for ultimate fit
Lightweight stretch cuff and hood finish for ease of use
Insulation : Stratus recycled 60g/m3 plus double layer 40g/m3
Composition : 100% polyamide with ePTFE membrane with 100% polyamide lining.
